name: Ultimate Puzzles Cars Collection
description:
Ultimate Puzzles Cars Collection - this is the second part of a new puzzle series that combines several previously released collections. This collection combines Ultimate Puzzles Cars and Ultimate Puzzles Cars 2, but now with an improved design, a 16:9 aspect ratio and a smaller size.
Choose the animal you like and put it forward. Each puzzle is 4x4 in size, but the complication is that the puzzles need to be rotated in the right direction.
